config_description: Defensive settings for protecting Cassandra from true network partitions. See (CASSANDRA-14358) for details.  The amount of time to wait for internode tcp connections to establish.
developer_understanding_on_working: The tcpConnectTimeoutInMS method returns the value of tcpConnectTimeoutInMS if it is not null, otherwise it retrieves the value from DatabaseDescriptor.getInternodeTcpConnectTimeoutInMS() method.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The internode_tcp_connect_timeout_in_ms configuration is triggered whenever the tcpConnectTimeoutInMS method is called in the code.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The internode_tcp_connect_timeout_in_ms configuration impacts the system by setting the amount of time to wait for internode tcp connections to establish, which helps in protecting Cassandra from true network partitions.
